author: Guest
title: Melii silicone baby spoons recalled due to choking hazard | Montana News | montanarightnow.com
text:
Melii silicone baby spoons recalled due to choking hazard Dec 19, 2024 Dec 19, 2024 Updated 30 mins ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save A recall alert has been issued for Melii silicone baby spoons sold at Aldi and BuyBuyBaby due to potential choking hazards. Over 85,000 spoons with animal-shaped handles are affected and could break apart during use. Parents and caregivers should stop using these spoons immediately to keep their children safe.
